original_title: Não é Permitido Sair Com Flores
overview: In a cemetery, from a dystopian Lisbon, a family of one woman and three children survives. The mother does not allow her children to leave the graveyard, but an event causes the eldest daughter to disregard this order, leaving her mother dominated by fear and anguish while her youngest daughter disappears.
title: Não é Permitido Sair Com Flores
